name: cookcam
description: CookCam - AI-powered cooking companion mobile app

scripts.mobile:build:ios: cd mobile/CookCam && npx eas build --platform ios
scripts.mobile:build:android: cd mobile/CookCam && npx eas build --platform android
scripts.mobile:build:all: cd mobile/CookCam && npx eas build --platform all
scripts.mobile:submit:ios: cd mobile/CookCam && npx eas submit --platform ios
scripts.mobile:submit:android: cd mobile/CookCam && npx eas submit --platform android
scripts.install:all: npm run install:mobile && npm run install:backend
